summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4034 for the improvement of the alley in block 45, Capitol Hill Addition, Division No. 6, being the alley between 20th Avenue North and 21st Avenue North, from East Roy Street to East Aloha Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48790, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
